title: Rikke and The Mist of Journeys
description: There's a full moon over Rikke's forest tonight, and nothing quite feels the same. She hears a strange noise coming from the old ash tree, and it sounds like a human child! But Rikke cant seem to understand anything the child says. Who is this child and where did she come from? And can Rikke help her before it's too late?More (presently unillustrated) stories in the Rikke Series Rikke, the Littlest Troll in NorwayRikke and the Shiny Horn (Featuring Prillar Guri)Rikke and the Haunted Stave ChurchRikke and Syttende Mai; Norwegian Independence DayRikke and the Peasant GirlRikke and the Lost VikingRikke and the Coin of TruthRikke and the Secret of the FjordsRikke and the Tattered BunadRikke and the Traveling TomtenRikke Goes to LaplandRikke's Very Merry Christmas; God Jul!Ã¸
author: Nikolina Nilsen
